level.heading: License renewal.
level.text: The Board of Medicine shall renew the license of a surgical assistant who, in addition to meeting the requirements of § 3-1205.04(q), has submitted to the Board, along with the application for renewal, documentation of current certification as a surgical assistant by:
The American Board of Surgical Assistants; or
The National Board of Surgical Technology and Surgical Assisting.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-26, in par. (1), deleted "or" from the end; in par. (2), substituted "; or" for a period at the end; and added par. (3).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(f) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).
